sentences.en: a sense of oneness with the natural world
And Pearl was the oneness of their being.
sentences.cn: 而珠儿就是他俩生命的合二为一.

sentences.en: Area differentiates should follow the main demand as objectivity, oneness.
sentences.cn: 区域划分要遵循客观性 、 同一性等基本要求.

sentences.en: Bhagavan: The word as we move into oneness is effortless effort.
sentences.cn: 巴格旺: 进入合一状态的关键词是“无为之为”.

sentences.en: But oneness a different idea of what is actually going on.
sentences.cn: 但是合一对于实际发生的事情有不同观点.

sentences.en: Instead of trying to disidentify from the ego, we need to embrace the ego while merging it with a sense of oneness.
sentences.cn: 不要试图从 自我作出错误的识别，我们需要在把 自我 与“ 单一性 ”的观念相合并的同时，要去包容 自我 。

sentences.en: Instinctively a knowing of your Oneness you begin to assume His qualities.
sentences.cn: 本能地,通过知晓你之“一体”,你开始呈现他的品质.

sentences.en: Not all may be suited to the paradigm shift into oneness ahead.
sentences.cn: 并不是所有人都适合在前方转变成全一范式.

sentences.en: Put in something about the Supernal Oneness . Don't say a syllable about the Infernal Twoness.
sentences.cn: 说一点天上的一元论,千万别谈地狱的二元论.

sentences.en: These two poems help me to further comprehend limitless oneness.
sentences.cn: 这两首诗令我对无限的一体有更进一步的体认.

sentences.en: This arbitrating peace preserves the oneness in the church life.
sentences.cn: 这种作仲裁的平安要保守召会生活里的一.

sentences.en: Thus he was enlightened to appreciate more about limitless oneness.
sentences.cn: 这样他就得到启发而能够更体会无限的一体.

sentences.en: Traditional Chinese people believe in oneness andand advocate holism.
sentences.cn: 中国人历来相信天人合一,主张整体观.

sentences.en: What happens when you drop the oneness of the knowing?
sentences.cn: 当你放下觉知的一体感,会发生什 麽 ?

sentences.en: You could also move beyond that and identify yourself with pure oneness or consciousness, devoid of any particular individuality.
sentences.cn: 也可能超越那些，用纯粹的“单一性”或缺乏特殊个性的自觉意识来识别你自己。

words.tran_cn: 统一性；单一性；同一性；完整

trans.tran_en: a peaceful feeling of being part of a whole
